description.value:
You create a ripple in the gravitational forces around you, bending it to your will. Select any number of creatures within a @Template[type:burst|distance:20]{20-foot burst}. Each affected creature takes @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2)d8)[bludgeoning]] damage and must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)] save against your class DC.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is pulled 5 feet towards the center or away from it, your choice.

Failure The creature takes full damage, is pulled 10 feet towards the center or away from it (your choice) and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is pulled 20 feet towards the center or away from it, and is knocked prone.

Level (+2) Increase the damage by 1d8.
